### Installing R-Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, ggstatsplot, tmap)
```
:::


### Installing Maptools


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools",
                 repos="https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```
:::


### Importing Geospatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP",                 
               layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\Users\ngkng\Desktop\School\Geo -Local\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex03\data\MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::


### Creating coastal outline

**st_union() to derive the coastal outline sf tibble data.frame**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_sf <- mpsz_sf %>% 
  st_union()

plot(sg_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
